lead_paragraph: The second-generation Chevy Volt, a plug-in hybrid available this spring, is more efficient than its predecessor, looks better and is about $1,000 less expensive. It’s also fun to drive.

headline.print_headline: Chevy Volt Impresses With Tech, Design and Driving Pleasure
headline.main: Video Review: Chevy Volt Impresses With Tech, Design and Driving Pleasure

snippet: The second-generation Chevy Volt, a plug-in hybrid available this spring, is more efficient than its predecessor, looks better and is about $1,000 less expensive. It’s also fun to drive.
abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Chevy Volt.
